#Command Format:
#[Data Count]:[Flags,Command]:[Periph Device, Address]:[Data(ignored for reads)]

#Ping
00000001:00000000:12345678:FEDCBA98

#Write one peice of data to the peripheral device 1, address 0, data 1
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000000

#Write 0x003 into Address 0x00 (Control) [Enble, Enable Interrupts]
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000003

#Write 4 values into memory
00000008:00010001:00000008:00000104
80000104
00000105
80000105
00000106
80000106
00000107
80000107



#Write 4 values into memory
00000008:00010001:00000000:00000100
80000100
00000101
80000101
00000102
80000102
00000103
80000103

#Write 0x001 into the clock divider for simulation
00000001:00000001:01000003:00000001

#Write 0x000 into Address 0x04 (Mem 0 Base)
00000001:00000001:01000004:00000000

#Write 0x040 into Address 0x05 (Mem 0 Size)
00000001:00000001:01000005:00000100

#Write 0x040 into Address 0x06 (Mem 1 Base)
00000001:00000001:01000006:00000100

#Write 0x040 into Address 0x07 (Mem 1 Size)
00000001:00000001:01000007:00000100



#Write 32 values into memory
00000200:00010001:00000000:00000000

#Read back the same data
0000000A:00010002:00000000:00000000

#Write 0x000 into Address 0x00 (Control) [Disable, Reset]
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000000

#Write 0x001 into the clock divider for simulation
00000001:00000001:01000003:00000001

#Write 0x000 into Address 0x04 (Mem 0 Base)
00000001:00000001:01000004:00000000

#Write 0x040 into Address 0x05 (Mem 0 Size)
00000001:00000001:01000005:00000100

#Write 0x040 into Address 0x06 (Mem 1 Base)
00000001:00000001:01000006:00000100

#Write 0x040 into Address 0x07 (Mem 1 Size)
00000001:00000001:01000007:00000100

#Write 0x003 into Address 0x00 (Control) [Enble, Enable Interrupts]
00000001:00000001:01000000:00000003

#Sleep
00000100

#Write 4 values into memory
00000008:00010001:00000000:00000100
80000100
00000101
80000101
00000102
80000102
00000103
80000103



#Write 0x040 into Address 0x05 (Mem 0 Size)
00000001:00000001:01000005:00000100

00000100

#Write 4 values into memory
00000008:00010001:00000008:00000104
80000104

80000107




#Write 0x040 into Address 0x07 (Mem 1 Size)
00000001:00000001:01000007:00000100

#Sleep
00001000



#Ping
00000000:00000000:12345678:FEDCBA98
